divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Rte 9 going North at about 9:40-10pm on May 12,2004. As I approached the Academy St exit ramp,I saw what at first appeared to be a string of red and green lights blinking slowly. As my car neared the lights, I found myself directly under an immense,low-flying craft. It was a huge, boomerang-shaped craft--it had a dark grey body and red and green lights along its "wings". It moved so slowly, it appeared to be floating. It was completely soundless. I tried to keep the object in sight,which was no easy feat since I had to keep my attention on the road. By the time I was able to park my car, the boomerang had vanished. When I first noticed this craft, I assumed it was some type of jet. The longer I watched it,however, the more I realized how impossible it would be for a jet to move that slowly, especially at such a low altitude. I also can't undersatand why nobody else has come forward about this. At the time of this sighting, there were at least a dozen other vehicles besides mine in the area.
Summary: Object moving south down rte 9--flying/floating slowly; immense, silent flying low.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Poughkeepsie
There was one other sighting in Poughkeepsie on or around May 12th 2004
